Package edu.bu.pas.othello.agents

Class TimedAgent

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.othello.agents.Agent
edu.bu.pas.othello.agents.TimedAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<Pair<Coordinate,Long>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TimedTreeSearchAgent
public abstract class TimedAgent extends Agent implements Callable<Pair<Coordinate,Long>>
An abstract class that represents an Agent who is only allowed to think for a maximum amount of time per move. If this agent thinks longer than the upper bound, the thinking is killed and the agent will submit null as its move. The thinking happens in a background thread.

  • Method Details

    • chooseCoordinateToPlaceTile

      public abstract Coordinate chooseCoordinateToPlaceTile(Game.GameView game)
      An abstract method that calculates the Coordinate of the move that this agent should make. This method is run in a background thread.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The move that this agent should make.

    • call

      public final Pair<Coordinate,Long> call() throws Exception
      A method that will be run in a background thread. This method simply calls chooseCoordinateToPlaceTile and monitors how long it took. It returns the move as well as the amount of time it took as a pair.
      Specified by:
      call in interface Callable<Pair<Coordinate,Long>>
      Returns:
      The move and the amount of time it took to calculate that move.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • makeMove

      public final Coordinate makeMove(Game.GameView game)
      A method that is called by the game every turn. This method lauches a background thread where the method call is executed. If the thread takes too long to return, the thread is killed and null is returned as the move, otherwise the value calculated by the background thread is returned as the move.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in class Agent
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The Coordinate move this agent will make. Will be null if the background thread takes too long to run.
